description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience the first decade and a half of gaming history in this challenging action-platformer. The Goddess Iliad longs to be remembered, and so sets forth her avatar to journey through 8 levels of action. Acquire special weapons as you defeat each gaming realm. Jump and climb through the environment and defeat your enemies until you reveal the final fate of the Goddess Iliad.
description.short: Experience the first decade and a half of gaming history in this challenging action-platformer.
